name: CHEER Official 3D
description:
Choreograph life like cheer routines in this amazing game! Add cheerleading star Gabi Butler and Tik Tok star Kory Little to your squad! Compete in the Cheer Virtual Championships!

We are using Apple's Standard End User License Agreement. BlackSleeve Media, Inc's Terms of Service can be located at: https://blacksleevemedia.com/cheerofficial/PrivacyAndTerms.html
